name: polar-hooks
description: Performs HTTP auth for us using a token scheme
author: burton@getpolarized.io

scripts.dist-release-polar-cors: firebase use polar-cors && yarn run firebase-deploy-functions
scripts.dist-release-polar-cors-beta: firebase use polar-cors-beta && yarn run firebase-deploy-functions
scripts.dist-release-main-webapp: echo Pushing to target ${FIREBASE_HOSTING_TARGET} && firebase use polar-32b0f && firebase target:clear hosting app.getpolarized.io && firebase target:apply hosting app.getpolarized.io ${FIREBASE_HOSTING_TARGET} && firebase deploy --only hosting,storage,firestore && yarn rur firebase-deploy-functions
scripts.dist-release: yarn run dist-release-init && yarn run dist-release-main-webapp
scripts.compile: RESULT="$(find . -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -name '*.d.ts*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'Nothing to Compile'; else yarn run tsc; fi;
scripts.test: RESULT="$(find . -name '**Test.js' -o -name '**TestN.js' -o -name '**TestNK.js' -not -path 'node_modules/*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'No tests'; else yarn run mocha; fi;
